name: Muto v1
description:
NOTICE: Clicking "Quit" will crash the game and require page refresh to continue playing the game. Mistake on my part for adding a quit button in a web game lol

Muto v1

Set how many cards are drawn and how each the cards affects the high score. Then reset and experiment with other parameters!

Special thanks to:

Pidge, for providing invaluable help and knowledge through the entire development process and being an amazing friend <3

My family, for helping me come up with the initial idea and additions for the game <3
